reviewText:
I really enjoyed this video. You see a group of good looking men moving and showing off themselves in a very provocative way. That being said, for those looking for a step by step introduction into male striptease, this might not be your best bet. Although the music in the first part of each section does include a voice giving instructions (swing, gyrate, touch, etc;), you`re basically just watching a bunch of guys dance and attempt to emulate some of the movements.

The second part of each section gives examples of real life use with a partner (each usage section has a gay and straight striptease).

If you want to focus on any one guy for pointers, the guy with the medium- length black hair is by far the most convincing (the cameras generally focus on him, so he must be pretty good).
the best movie (documentary film) i have ever owned. they sure know how to dance.  beautiful young men and daring examples of seductive dancing.

this is a fantastic dvd.  if you like asian young men dancing and stripping, you can't beat this movie.  the cast if young, fresh and sexy.
a how to dvd, it is exciting as well.
